google-docs.description: Google Docs MCP server for creating and managing financial documents: budget spreadsheets, P&L statements, financial reports, and forecast documents shared with stakeholders. Used to publish and collaborate on financial deliverables.

gmail.description: Gmail MCP server for financial communication workflows: sending invoices to clients, distributing financial reports to stakeholders, sending payment reminders for overdue invoices, and delivering budget variance alerts to department heads.

slack.description: Slack MCP server for real-time financial notifications: budget threshold alerts in #finance channel, payment received confirmations, revenue milestone announcements, overdue invoice escalations, and expense approval requests.
